Articles.Content:
Here is where I will put my art.

here is a gemini capsule In orbit about kerbin. As you can see, It has no more propulsion pack, nor propellant left. as life support systems run out, Bill realises that...

He's not going home...

Edited February 19, 2014 by ZodiaK
any criticism or ideas? I can take requests if you want
Looks great! I think the clouds could do with a bit of rounding though

Interesting, but it could use work.. it loooks like someone took a paintbrush, dipped in different colors, and SPLASSSSSSSSHY ALL THE THINGS UNTIL IT LOOKS LIKE SOMETHING.

just saying.

Looks great! I think the clouds could do with a bit of rounding though

I agree. I like the style, but Kerbin is a bit too jagged/splotchy. Nice work overall though.

Oh, and the terrain overlaps the capsule a little bit... pretty sure it's not supposed to do that.

Can you do a picture of several kerbals in dark green 1840's style military uniforms and with pickelhaubes, all of them having various moustaches. Title it "Meeting at the Medwedian Presidental Office". One of them should have a really big moustache and wear a really decorated uniform, being the president.
nice! I really like the work on the capsule
thanks all for your criticism. I'm going to do a rework of kerbin on 'not going home' after I do the President's request.
by the way, Mr.President, Do you have a Logo you want included on your request?

No. This is a president's office with generals in it. Althrough, on the president's table you might include a table flag:

And don't forget all generals and the president to have sashes over the right shoulder, belts and 1840's style uniforms. On the table (which should be made of oakwood) you may include some ornament which includes the Medwedian Star. Behind the president's table there should be a big window which opens a view of a forest, on a sunny day.

Also another request, this time set in the 1950's. The president should have his old 1840's-like parade uniform with lots of medals but there also should be a general reporting to him (who also wears a pickelhaube) in an olive green uniform with a sam browne belt. The office is the same, but in the background the trees of the forest are being sawn down by workers and buildings being assembled. It should also be set on a cloudy day. The president should have a moustache with sideburns.

Yet another request, set at the KSC (which is occupied by Medwedia), in the office of the KSC director who wears a olive green Marshal's uniform with sam browne belt and lots of medals. The office should be 1930's style (the time when the KSC was built), with the window showing a view of many soldiers in pickelhaubes marching in formation, with rifles, guarding a KSC facility. The KSC director should have a moustache.

Again another request, this time a street in a rural mountainous town with people in pilgrim hats which are brimmed up on the right side, watching strange lights in the sky, which are from the reentry of a spacecraft.

Sorry if i'm overloading you, but you can take your time.

Edited February 20, 2014 by MedwedianPresident

*BZZT* OVERLOAD ALARM. OVERLOAD ALARM.

(don't worry, I'll do what I can.)
